General.Name: Oriental Energy Co Ltd
General.Description: Oriental Energy Co., Ltd. engages in the production and sale of low-temperature and atmospheric pressure liquefied petroleum gas, propylene, polypropylene, and other chemical products in China. The company also offers storage services for chemical products, including methanol, n-propanol, isopropanol, n-butanol, isobutanol, toluene, xylene, ortho-2 Toluene, p-xylene, styrene, propane, and butane. In addition, it provides terminal facilities services for ships; and cargo handling, warehousing, and logistics services. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Nanjing, China.

4.Name: Mr. Wenxin  Chen
4.Title: Sec. of the Board of Directors
